task.title: Generating PDF Output from DITA Content Using a Command Line

keywords.indexterm: DITA to PDF from a command line

context.p: To process and publish DITA to PDF using CSS and , follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Download and install the Oxygen Publishing Engine. This bundles a DITA Open Toolkit () with all the required plugins to generate PDF output, including the processor.
Place the license key for the Oxygen Publishing Engine in a licensekey.txt file in the installation folder.

Run the publishing engine from a command line and make sure you specify the format to be pdf-css-html5 and the path to your main DITA map. Specify additional parameters (such as args.css) if you want to customize the output. See the documentation for more information about customizing DITA output and accepted parameters.
